description.@en: I have learned the most important lesson of traveling in the wild—leave no evidence, extinguish the fire and stagger ones’ steps to avoid being found.

system.notes:
Frontier Trait

Professions of this Archetype typically live on the fringes of urban society and in the frontier lands. They make trade off the bounty the land affords them, hiring themselves out as surveyors and protecting others.

effect.@en: When moving through uninhabited rural areas, you leave no trace of your passing and cannot be found with Skills or Spells.
